product_description: Indus Valley brings to you this superb combo of Amla, Reetha and Shikakai powder—a one-stop-solution for all your hair woes. The 100% pure and organic Amla, Reetha and Shikakai powders are obtained from organically grown plants, the ingredients handpicked by dedicated farmers, sun-dried, crushed into a triple-sifted, microfine powder that doesn’t lump even on prolonged packaging. The microfine powders easily mix into a paste enabling quick application. In this super-easy herbal formulation, Amla, Shikakai and Reetha powder for hair work together to darken your hair colour naturally preventing premature greying of hair. Loaded with antioxidants and vitamins A, D, E and K, the reetha amla shikakai combo provides ultimate nutrients to the scalp and hair, nourishes from deep within, strengthens hair follicles and arrests hair fall. Reetha and Amla powder for hair growth when combined with Shikakai powder for hair growth together stimulate the dormant hair follicles and promote healthy hair growth. Reetha and Shikakai act as natural scalp cleansers, removing all dirt impurities and oil build-ups without stripping it off its natural oil. The antibacterial and antifungal properties of reetha and shikakai combat dandruff and keep the scalp hydrated and moisturised. Shikakai for hair also helps in maintaining the pH balance of scalp, conditions hair and makes your hair soft and silky. Amla, also known as Indian Gooseberry, boosts immunity when consumed. Indus Valley Bio-Organic Amla Fruit Powder is certified as edible by FSSAI. When Amla powder for skin is used as a face mask, it brightens the skin complexion and reduces pigmentation. While Shikakai helps in reducing wrinkles and delays premature ageing. This combo pack is, therefore, a complete solution for boosting the health of both skin and hair.

product_description: This is powder of sun dried leaves of bramhi (bacopa monniera) and 100% herbal and naturally homemade. Brahmi or indian pennywort has leaves which are round, coin shaped and grow in groups of twos or threes. Brahmi is an age old herb found all over india, near water bodies. Brahmi is known to be an ayurvedic and traditional remedy for hair problems. Its effectiveness and benefits vary, depending on each individual's scalp condition and body chemistry. Benefits for hair- reduces hair fall- * brahmi powder helps nourish the roots well and accelerates hair growth by thickening the roots. Brahmi also helps to the keep the scalp cool and strengthens the hair follicles. Treats split ends * the application of brahmi powder coats the hair with some shine and restores its lost lustre. In this manner, it reduces the chance of split ends and adds volume and bounce to the hair texture. Prevents dandruff * brahmi possesses exceptional hair moisturising properties. This helps solve dry scalp issues, including itchiness and dandruff, as it nourishes the scalp well.

product_description:
Packed with hair growing and better skin benefits, Our WishCare Castor Oil is the oil you need to grow fuller hair and lush eyelashes and look bright !
Extracted by artisanal farmers in Kerala, India, Our Castor Oil is one of Earth's most versatile healing gifts. Unrefined and cold-pressed, it is not only packed with antioxidants, but also retains all its vitamins and nutrients in the process.
For Your Hair - Apply Castor Oil to your scalp and massage. Leave for 30 minutes before rinsing. Heat the oil to help it penetrate your scalp faster, or add a few drops of our WishCare Tea Tree oil to promote growth. You may also leave the Caster Oil on overnight and cover your hair with a shower cap.
For Your Eyelashes and Eyebrows - Apply a drop to your eyelashes or eyebrows before going to sleep. Rinse in the morning.
For Your Face - Apply Castor Oil to the face for 30 minutes before rinsing. Warming the oil beforehand will allow it to penetrate the skin faster.
For Your Lips - Apply a few drops before leaving the house to enjoy soft and plump lips

It is rich in amino acid that keeps your hair nourished. ?? Bhringraj (Eclipta Alba) is famous in India for its use as a natural hair tonic. product_description: Berina Hair cream for natural looking straight hair Leaves you with even, smooth, shiny and manageable hair Deep conditioning treatment that gives sleek hair Protects from harmful UV rays, heat and blow-drying Hair straightening cream (125ml) + Neutraliser (125ml). Usage guidelines: Straightener No.1 Coats the entire hair evenly, except for roots and let it set at room temperature for 10 - 20 minutes. After that, rinse it sufficiently with plain water, dry the hair and set with hot straightening iron at 180°C/ 356°F. When applying, keep 1 - 2 cm above hair roots, as getting it on the scalp could cause irritation and breakage of hair. Use an intermediate water to rinse it away completely. Wash the roots carefully. Neutralizer No.2 Coat the entire hair and leave it for 20 - 30 minutes, at the same time combing it lightly. Then, completely wash it away. Complete the process. If the neutralization is not complete, it could cause damage or hair breakage, thus coat the hair sufficiently from roots to tip of hair to make sure the neutralization process is completed. Note: This product needs expert knowledge so the result may vary based on expertise. There are certain do's and don's needs to be followed. Like the result may vary on recent chemical treated hair like permanent hair color, Mahendi , Highlights etc

product_description:
Your tresses damaged by weather elements and chemicals demand special care that most shampoos are incapable of providing. StBotanica Pro Keratin & Argan Oil Shampoo is a unique cleanser created to replenish your hair’s lost protein and hydration. It is the perfect choice for getting rid of frizz and smoothing the rough hair. It helps your hair detangle with ease. Your hair is intensely hydrated and nourished while it is being cleansed, thereby boosting the health and appearance of your locks. By incorporating this novel shampoo in your daily hair care ritual, your hair becomes more manageable and easy to style. 

Keratin for Smooth Frizz-Free Hair 

Hydrolyzed keratin protein infused in shampoo helps tackle frizzy hair. The protein molecules penetrate the hair cuticle and smooth the strands. The micro-gaps in the damaged hair shaft are filled by the protein that helps in strengthening the hair and locking in moisture. It’s the best shampoo for eliminating hair dryness and split ends and repairing the damaged tresses. 

Conditioning with Natural Oils 

Your hair is moisturized with a cocktail of premium natural oils such as Moroccan argan oil, golden jojoba oil, sweet almond oil and castor oil. The hair is deeply hydrated and attains a smooth glossy appearance that lasts for a long time. 

Strengthens Hair & Supports Hair Growth 

The intensely nourishing shampoo helps rejuvenate the hair follicles. Multiple botanical extracts with bioactive compounds beneficial for the health of the hair are infused in the shampoo. Brahmi, Jatamansi, Bhringraj, Manjistha and hibiscus work as Hair Strengthening Boosters. With every wash your tresses become healthier and stronger. For best result, pair Pro Keratin & Argan Oil Shampoo with Pro Keratin & Argan Oil Conditioner.

This Shampoo contains Aloe Vera and Mint extract to combat dandruff and add volume and strength to your locks. Aloe Vera and mint extract are natural ingredients that refresh and hydrate hair and scalp.
Firstleaf Aloe vera Mint Shampoo penetrates your hair follicles to condition and improves damaged, dry hair. Aloe vera extracts help treat itchy scalp, deep cleanse oily hair and strengthen them, whereas mint leaves, an antiseptic and anti-microbial ingredient, promote hair growth and reduce breakage. Together, they can also treat dandruff, prevent the development of any unwanted bacteria or infection on the scalp, and give shine-lasting healthy hair. The therapeutic quality of Mint makes it the perfect element you need in your hair care regimen.
Firstleaf Aloe vera & Mint shampoo help to fight dandruff and control oil. Mint leaves also strengthen hair and reduce breakage. The combination of aloe vera and mint leaves will free your scalp of toxins and grimes. Its gentle formula also minimizes the appearance of hair fall and promotes healthy hair growth.
 This Shampoo is completely free of Sulfates, Silicones, Parabens, Mineral Oil & Dyes. It's also good for the environment and you due to the absence of harsh chemicals. Its antiseptic properties and antioxidants will nourish your hair while relieving dandruff. Moreover, this Shampoo protects your scalp from dandruff, leaving your hair smooth, hydrated, and smelling fresh. It's an excellent choice for any person with sensitive or dry hair.

Aloe Vera is an excellent conditioner for all hair types, and it can penetrate the hair shaft, providing moisture and nourishment for the strands. Aloe Vera contains amino acids, carbon, and oxygen, similar to the chemical makeup of keratin, the primary protein in hair. Thus, aloe vera shampoo helps revitalize your hair by strengthening its outer cuticle, giving it a healthy, shiny appearance.
